bestPractices: Always set alt text; use empty alt for decorative images.
Specify dimensions via width/height or aspectRatio to avoid layout shift.
Choose fit (`cover`/`contain`) and objectPosition deliberately to control cropping/focus.
Use srcSet/sizes for responsive sources; avoid full‑resolution assets in small spaces.
Default lazy loading is enabled; use loading='eager' and optionally fetchPriority='high' for LCP heroes.
Avoid background images for content; prefer `<Image>` so a11y tools can interpret it.
Apply rounded corners via a wrapper (Panel/Box) with `overflow: hidden` or via sx; avoid per‑component shape props.
